chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall ir : list IR, good_trace ir -> forall l : list op, (forall k : K, In (O k) l -> In (IRO k) ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) l) -> (forall k k' : K, In (I k') l -> before (O k) (I k') l -> before (IRO k) (IRI k') ir) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) l -> before (I k) (O k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l) -> NoDup (get_op_input_keys l) -> NoDup (get_IR_input_keys ir) -> NoDup (get_op_output_keys l) -> NoDup (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> IR_equivalent (acknowledge_all_ops_func l ir) ir

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
get_op_output_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I _ => None | O k => Some k end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_output_keys _%list_scope
good_trace = fix good_trace (l : list IR) : Prop := match l with | [] => True | [IRI k] | IRI k :: IRI _ :: _ => False | IRI k :: IRO k' :: l' | IRI k :: IRU k' :: l' => k = k' /\ good_trace l' | _ => False end : list IR -> Prop Arguments good_trace _%list_scope
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
get_IR_input_keys = fun l : list IR => filterMap (fun x : IR => match x with | IRI k => Some k | _ => None end) l : list IR -> list K Arguments get_IR_input_keys _%list_scope
before : ?A -> ?A -> list ?A -> Prop where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
NoDup : forall A : Type, list A -> Prop
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _
get_IR_output_keys = fun l : list IR => filterMap (fun x : IR => match x with | IRI _ => None | IRO k | IRU k => Some k end) l : list IR -> list K Arguments get_IR_output_keys _%list_scope
get_op_input_keys = fun l : list op => filterMap (fun x : op => match x with | I k => Some k | O _ => None end) l : list op -> list K Arguments get_op_input_keys _%list_scope
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
IRU_I_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys)
good_trace_IRI_in : forall ir : list IR, good_trace ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (IRO k) ir \/ In (IRU k) ir
IRO_O_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
IRO_O_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRI_I_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_input_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRI k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys)
IRU_not_O_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir) -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ ys)
IRU_I_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_output_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRI_I_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), ~ In k' (get_IR_input_keys ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRI k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> In (I k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
IRU_not_O_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir) -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
O_IRO_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRU k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> In (IRO k) ir
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext_strong : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (I k) l -> In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (I k) l -> In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
in_before_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k' : K), ~ acknowledged_op k' (xs ++ ys) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys) -> before (I k) (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> before (I k) (O k) (xs ++ ys)
O_IRO_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs) -> In (IRO k) (IRI k' :: IRO k' :: ir)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> In (IRO k) ir
good_op_move_good_move_IO : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (I k) (O k') -> good_move (IRI k) (IRO k')
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_nil : forall l : list op, (forall k : K, ~ In (O k) l) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l [] = []
acknowledge_all_ops_func_target_ext : forall (l : list op) (t t' : list IR), (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t -> In (IRU k) t') -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) t' -> In (IRU k) t) -> acknowledge_all_ops_func l t = acknowledge_all_ops_func l t'
in_before_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k' : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs) -> before (I k) (O k) (xs ++ I k' :: ys ++ O k' :: zs)) -> forall k : K, In (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> before (I k) (O k) (xs ++ ys ++ zs)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_IRU_In : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR) (k : K), In (IRU k) (acknowledge_all_ops_func l ir) -> In (I k) l
in_before_before_preserved_IU : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys)) -> (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI k :: IRU k :: ir)) -> forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ ys) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) ir
op_equivalent_all_Is_O : forall (l : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') l -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (l ++ [O k]) (O k :: l)
good_trace_ind : forall P : list IR -> Prop -> Prop, P [] True -> (forall k : K, P [IRI k] False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRI k :: IRI k' :: ir) False) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRO k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k k' : K) (ir : list IR), P ir (good_trace ir) -> P (IRI k :: IRU k' :: ir) (k = k' /\ good_trace ir)) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRO k :: ir) False) -> (forall (k : K) (ir : list IR), P (IRU k :: ir) False) -> forall ir : list IR, P ir (good_trace ir)
before_head_op : forall (l : list op) (h : K) (ir : list IR), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
get_op_output_keys_sound : forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_output_keys l) -> In (O k) l
not_good_op_move_OI : forall k k' : K, good_op_move (O k) (I k') -> False
good_op_move_neq_IO : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_op_move (I k) (O k')
get_op_input_keys_sound : forall (k : K) (l : list op), In k (get_op_input_keys l) -> In (I k) l
not_good_op_move_IO : forall k : K, good_op_move (I k) (O k) -> False
in_before_before_preserved : forall (xs ys zs : list op) (k : K) (ir : list IR), NoDup (get_op_input_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs)) -> (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ I k :: ys ++ O k :: zs) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI k :: IRO k :: ir)) -> forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> before (O k1) (I k2) (xs ++ ys ++ zs) -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) ir
get_op_input_keys_on_Os_nil : forall l : list op, (forall o : op, In o l -> exists k : K, o = O k) -> get_op_input_keys l = []
good_move_IO_neq : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_move (IRI k) (IRO k')
pigeon : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l sub1 sub2 : list A, (forall a : A, In a sub1 -> In a l) -> (forall a : A, In a sub2 -> In a l) -> NoDup l -> NoDup sub1 -> NoDup sub2 -> length sub1 + length sub2 > length l -> exists a : A, In a sub1 /\ In a sub2
good_move_IU_neq : forall k k' : K, k <> k' -> good_move (IRI k) (IRU k')
op_equivalent_all_Is_O_middle : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), (forall k' : K, In (I k') xs -> k <> k') -> op_equivalent (xs ++ O k :: ys) (O k :: xs ++ ys)
NoDup_get_op_output_keys_In_O : forall (xs ys : list op) (k : K), NoDup (get_op_output_keys (xs ++ O k :: ys)) -> In (O k) (xs ++ ys) -> False
get_op_output_keys_complete : forall (xs : list op) (k : K), In (O k) xs -> In k (get_op_output_keys xs)
op_rect : forall P : op -> Type, (forall k : K, P (I k)) -> (forall k : K, P (O k)) -> forall o : op, P o
op_rec : forall P : op -> Set, (forall k : K, P (I k)) -> (forall k : K, P (O k)) -> forall o : op, P o
op_ind : forall P : op -> Prop, (forall k : K, P (I k)) -> (forall k : K, P (O k)) -> forall o : op, P o
op_sind : forall P : op -> SProp, (forall k : K, P (I k)) -> (forall k : K, P (O k)) -> forall o : op, P o
